abstract_summ: The coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic is the defining global health crisis of our time and the greatest challenge facing the world . This study investigated the effects of temperature and relative humidity on daily new cases and daily new deaths of COVID-2019 . A 1 °C increase in temperature was associated with a 3.08% (95% CI: 0.53%, 4.63%) reduction in daily new . cases and a 1% increase in relative humidity .
